feed.title: Minifyre Blog
feed.subtitle: Short stories, media analysis, tech writeups, and more!

entry.title: Learning from RWBY's Trailers: Analysis, Review, Critique, and Commentary
entry.summary: RWBY is not full of fetishized fanservice (though the camera could have aimed a little higher in the final trailer's opening). Instead, it features a colorful cast of characters in a unique world that seamlessly blends elements of sci-fi & fantasy with modernity. Also, the fight scenes, weapons, and music are amazing.

entry.title: Simplifying Your Wardrobe
entry.summary: Here are a few tips and tricks that helped me slim down my wardrobe.
